step_feedback.feedback: Good job closing your fingers into fists and drawing your arms in. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this step.
Excellent work opening your fingers and extending your arms horizontally. Ensure you are exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you do this.
You're doing great with the arm extension and muscle relaxation. Keep up the good work on the exhale.
Your arm movements are looking good. Remember to focus on relaxing your muscles as you extend your arms.
Great job completing the repetitions! You're effectively opening your fingers and extending your arms.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to fully open your fingers and extend your arms while exhaling and relaxing your muscles. Keep practicing these movements to help with lymph drainage.
